Words.description: Imagine a world where the big screen meets the night sky at AirScreen—a unique open-air cinema. Gather your loved ones and enjoy the magic of cinema like never before. Whether it’s a romantic evening, a family outing, or some solitary moments, AirScreen promises unforgettable memories under the stars.
Words.descTwo: Don't just watch a movie - feel it.
Words.descThree: where the sky is the limit!
Words.title: a unique open-air cinema
Words.error_order_delete: We were unable to delete your order.
Words.login_worning: Please log in to the project to see this page

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.description: Welcome to AirScreen. Your privacy is very important to us. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal information.
PrivacyPolicy.text2: We may collect the following data
PrivacyPolicy.text3: Personal data: name, email address, phone number, and other information you provide
PrivacyPolicy.text4: Usage data: information about how you use our website and services
PrivacyPolicy.text7: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
PrivacyPolicy.text8: To respond to inquiries and support requests
PrivacyPolicy.text9: To ensure security and protect against fraud
PrivacyPolicy.text10: To send updates, promotional materials, and service-related notifications (if you agree)
PrivacyPolicy.text12: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties without your consent, except as required by law
PrivacyPolicy.text13: We apply reliable security measures to protect your data
PrivacyPolicy.text15: You may request access to, update, or delete your personal data
PrivacyPolicy.text16: You may opt out of marketing communications at any time
PrivacyPolicy.text17: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
PrivacyPolicy.text18: You may request that your personal data be deleted when it is no longer needed in our systems
PrivacyPolicy.text20: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at airscreen@gmail.com or call 041033456, 094033456
PrivacyPolicy.text21: By using our services, you agree to this privacy policy. It may be updated from time to time, so please check for changes
PrivacyPolicy.text24: Outside Food and Beverages: Bringing outside food or beverages into the cinema premises is not allowed. This includes, but is not limited to, alcoholic drinks, carbonated beverages, snacks, etc.

About.title: About Us
About.description: AirScreen — where cinema steps off the screen and lives in a real atmosphere.
About.text1: We are an innovative outdoor cinema that brings together the charm of nature, comfort, and modern technology to create a unique viewing experience.
About.text2: Watch films not just on a screen, but under the open sky.
About.text4: In deep forests — with fresh air and sounds of nature
About.text5: On urban rooftops — with breathtaking views
About.text6: Or enjoy films right from your car — in drive-in format
About.text7: What you can watch with us
About.text10: UFC fights — with high quality and immersive atmosphere
About.text12: Watch movies without leaving your car. Audio is transmitted via a special frequency to your car's sound system.
About.text17: AirScreen is more than just a cinema.
About.text18: It’s an experience that stays in memory — with real emotions, a special atmosphere, and unforgettable moments.
About.text19: Join us — where cinema meets the sky.

Seo.title: AirScreen — Outdoor Cinema Under the Stars
Seo.description: Watch movies, football, and UFC outdoors — in the forest, on rooftops, or from your car. AirScreen offers a unique cinematic experience blending nature, comfort, and emotion.
